snippet: AEK Athens midfielder Giorgos Katidis was rebuked by politicians, fellow athletes and fans after appearing to give a Nazi salute in celebration of a goal he scored.
abstract: AEK Athens midfielder Giorgos Katidis is rebuked by politicians, fellow athletes and fans after appearing to give Nazi salute during goal celebration; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: AEK Athens midfielder Giorgos Katidis was rebuked by politicians, fellow athletes and fans after appearing to give a Nazi salute in celebration of a goal he scored.

headline.main: Salute From Athens Soccer Player Draws Rebukes
